name: Victoria Student Report
description: Victoria school report format aligned with Victorian Curriculum F-10

achievement_scale.label: Well Above Standard
achievement_scale.description: Student demonstrates knowledge and skills well beyond the expected standard for their year level.

achievement_scale.label: Above Standard
achievement_scale.description: Student demonstrates knowledge and skills beyond the expected standard for their year level.

achievement_scale.label: At Standard
achievement_scale.description: Student demonstrates the knowledge and skills expected at their year level.

achievement_scale.label: Below Standard
achievement_scale.description: Student is working toward the knowledge and skills expected at their year level.

achievement_scale.label: Well Below Standard
achievement_scale.description: Student needs additional support to develop the knowledge and skills expected at their year level.

effort_scale.label: Excellent
effort_scale.description: Student consistently demonstrates high effort and engagement with their learning.

effort_scale.label: Very Good
effort_scale.description: Student usually demonstrates strong effort and engagement with their learning.

effort_scale.label: Satisfactory
effort_scale.description: Student demonstrates adequate effort and engagement with their learning.

effort_scale.label: Below Average
effort_scale.description: Student demonstrates inconsistent effort and engagement with their learning.

effort_scale.label: Low
effort_scale.description: Student demonstrates minimal effort and engagement with their learning.
